_.summary: Improve CLV and reduce churn with Sailthruâ€™s high-performance email, mobile marketing, site personalization and predictive intelligence.
_.description:
This extension enables you to fully integrate with Sailthru's powerful suite of products:
- Automatically deploy Sailthru Javascript (Horizon or Sailthru Script Tag). - Add all users into the Sailthru system on login or registration. - Hook Magento's newsletter subscriptions into a Sailthru list. - Deliver Magento transactionals through Sailthru for enhanced deliverability, tracking, and user flows. - Create custom Sailthru templates for Customer Signup, Newsletter Signup, Order Confirmation, and Shipping. - Capture customers order data with adjustments and Sailthru campaign attribution. - Deliver abandoned cart emails for known users.
_.notes:
This update enables a Beta feature for adding a new Sailthru mass action for the product catalog. Send bulk updates to the Sailthru content library for a given store.
* Note: This is beta functionality and may take longer than two minutes to complete, you may also see memory issues on the request. Please report any issues. *
